full_summary:
### Government Contract Opportunity

#### Solicitation Title

* English: **Crane Rental and Operation Services – Quebec Waterways**
* French: **Services de location et d’opération de grues – Voies navigables au Québec**

#### Solicitation Details

* Solicitation Number: 5P300-22-0112/A
* Publication Date: 2022-09-21
* Tender Closing Date: 2022-10-06T14:00:00
* Tender Category: Standing Offer
* Procurement Method: Open Bidding
* Trade Agreements: Various
* Regions of Opportunity: Worldwide
* Regions of Delivery: Quebec (except NCR)

#### Description

This solicitation is for a Standing Offer Agreement for the rental and operation of cranes and related equipment for the Quebec Waterways Field Unit. The services required include the provision of boom trucks, tractors, trailers, and extensible cranes of various sizes and capacities, as well as accessories, for work involving the lifting and transportation of materials on sites belonging to the Quebec Waterways Field Unit.

The period of the Standing Offer Agreement will be from the date of award to October 31, 2023, with options to extend for two additional one-year periods.

All enquiries of a technical and contractual nature should be submitted to the contracting authority in writing no later than 5 calendar days prior to the tender closing date. National Parks Regulations require that all work be performed in accordance with the ordinances, laws, rules, and regulations set out in the National Park Act.

### Requirements

* Provide crane rental and operation services as and when needed for work involving the lifting and transportation of materials
* Operate boom trucks, tractors, trailers, and extensible cranes of various sizes and capacities
* Provide related equipment and accessories as required

### Evaluation and Award Criteria

The selection of the winning bidder will be based on the evaluation of their bid to ensure compliance with the requirements and conditions outlined in this solicitation.

### Contact Information

* Contracting Authority: Parks Canada
* Contracting Officer: Mazerolle-Losier, Marie-Michelle
* Contact Email: [marine-michelle.mazerolle-losier@pc.gc.ca](mailto:marie-michelle.mazerolle-losier@pc.gc.ca)
* Contact Phone: None
* Contact Fax: None

### Tender Documents

Tender documents can be obtained from the Government Electronic Tendering Service through the Government of Canada tendering service at [
